rules.description: FN ASDF arrow keys
Kylpo Symbols Keymapping
Quit application by holding command-q (Available with the latest beta version (Karabiner-Elements 11.4.4 or later)
PC-Style Control+Delete/Backspace
Quit application by holding command-q
Change caps_lock to command if pressed with other keys, to escape if pressed alone.
FN Command h,enter to Option backspace,del
FN Command j,k,l,space to Option arrow keys
FN j,k,l,space to arrow keys
FN u,i,o,p,h,enter to home,pgup,pgdwn,end,backspace,del
KYLPO fn-keys
Command backspace,del to Option backspace,del
Command arrow keys exchanged with Option arrow keys
Change caps_lock to control if pressed with other keys, to escape if pressed alone.
Use Delete as Move to Trash
Chrome: exchange ctrl and cmd click
Figma/Sketch: D to move ('drag') instead of Space
Figma/Sketch: E to measure ('exact') instead of Option
Exchange command q,w with ctrl q,w. ctrl q must be held down.
System-wide Vimium
Change caps_lock to control if pressed with other keys, to escape if pressed alone.
